InventoryID: San Francisco, private coll. (Dr. and Mrs. Oremland), ex New York Market, Sotheby, Sale Cat. 24 Nov. 1986, no. 75 (ill.)
Imagery Description: Draped woman, holding fillet and phiale, between a satyr, leaning forward to r., over raised l. foot, and holding a beadNon Sepcifiedwreath and a flower, and a nude youth holding a piece of drapery behind his legs with both hands. Below the handles: female heads.
Additional Notes: For the draped woman cf. no. 384 or 387. The treatment of the dotNon Sepcifiedstripe borders of the drapery is very typical of this painter.
